articles.title: What’s behind the investigation into Tupac Shakur’s murder? - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Almost three decades after the rapper was killed in a drive-by shooting, Las Vegas police have revived the case.
articles.content: An investigation into the unsolved murder of Tupac Shakur, widely known as 2Pac, has been revived after authorities in the US state of Nevada served a search warrant this week in connection with the … [+5484 chars]

articles.title: ‘There’s nothing American about promoting violence’: country star Jason Aldean criticised for anti-protest song - The Guardian
